column1: Little Goat Diner////I hate to say this
column2: but my wife and I were psyched to go here for breakfast and the food is not that great. With all the incredible reviews
column3: maybe we set the bar too high
column4: but it was mediocre. I would argue that they try to make the food too unique. I'm all for fusion
column6: but the food still has to be good. And it wasn't that good.
